programme.title: Love Finds You In Charm
programme.desc: A young Amish woman, who isn't satisfied with her path at home, visits a cousin for the summer. Over the summer, she is exposed to another world, finds friendship and more. Soon she must choose and come to terms with the life she wants.

programme.title: Down and Derby
programme.desc: A local Pinewood Derby competition transforms an average group of dads into overzealous rivals desperate to build the winning car.

programme.title: Finding Love In Sisters
programme.desc: When her mother dies, Esperanza returns to Sisters, Oregon and reunites with her sisters.

programme.title: Identical Love
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Dr. Charlotte Hudson needs to escape life at home. She signs up to volunteer at a health clinic in a tropical country. But her plans of escaping are thrown off when she comes across her former fiancé’s twin brother, Seth (a dentist), who is also volunteering with the clinic. As they spend time together, Seth falls in love with Charlotte, but she struggles to let go of seeing her fiancé every time she looks at Seth. The island romance will help her break free from the past and love Seth for who he is.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Christmas Recipe For Romance
programme.desc: The owner of a historic inn decides to enter a prestigious cooking contest to win funds for renovations and get free publicity, but she is a horrible cook. She recruits a renowned chef to help but the kitchen isn't the only thing heating up.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas in the English countryside wasn't in Emma's plans until her sister, Amy, plans her wedding for Christmas eve. Dylan, Amy's co-Christmas market owner, teams up with Emma to bring order to the whirlwind wedding.

programme.title: Olympians At Heart
programme.desc: Twins Essie and Ella are best friends who share a passion for gymnastics. When they are both up for the same event, its causes a divided, and they're faced with the challenge of competing against each other.

programme.title: Finding Love In Sisters
programme.desc: When her mother dies, Esperanza returns to Sisters, Oregon and reunites with her sisters.

programme.title: Identical Love
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Dr. Charlotte Hudson needs to escape life at home. She signs up to volunteer at a health clinic in a tropical country. programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Emma sets up Lizzie on a date that goes well, until Lizzie wonders why the date doesn't call again. Her constant analysis of the date leads to an evening of nit-picking details, until Grant sheds light on a more realistic viewpoint. Elinor finds a mouse in her apartment, and takes up arms to eradicate the pest—only to discover Marianne’s secret trash stash that has been feeding the mouse.

programme.title: Christmas Recipe For Romance
programme.desc: The owner of a historic inn decides to enter a prestigious cooking contest to win funds for renovations and get free publicity, but she is a horrible cook. She recruits a renowned chef to help but the kitchen isn't the only thing heating up.

programme.desc: Twins Essie and Ella are best friends who share a passion for gymnastics. When they are both up for the same event, its causes a divided, and they're faced with the challenge of competing against each other.

programme.title: Letters From the Heart
programme.desc: Hope’s Nona passes away, and upon Hopes return to Cherry Valley for the funeral, she learns she is to inherit a large sum of money, with one condition.
